name: Bently
bio: This super snuggly 4 year old bunny loves his humans. He's always up for a snuggle on your shoulder. With the cold winter on the way he will be great to keep your lap warm. He is easy going and perfect for a beginner who is looking for somebunny to love. And an added bonus.. he keeps his potty in one conner to make cleaning the cage much less time consuming .
